Characteristics[NumberOfTechnicalReplica: analyzed in up to five technical replicates each
Characteristics[NumberOfSamples]: Primary CRC (HLA-class I: n=30; HLA-class II: n=19) and corresponding non-malignant colon (NMC, HLA-class I: n=35; HLA-class II: n=20) tissue samples were obtained from surgical specimens (Suppl. Table 1).
Comment[EnrichmentMethod]: HLA-class I and II molecules were isolated by immunoaffinity purification using the panHLA-class I monoclonal antibody W6/32, the HLA-DR monoclonal antibody L243 and the panHLA-class II monoclonal antibody Tü39 (all produced in-house). Separate purification of HLA-class I and II ligands was performed eluting peptides with 0.2% trifluoroacetic acid.
Comment[Separation]: nanoflow uHPLC (UltiMate 3000 RSLCnano System, ThermoFisher, Waltham, MA)
Comment[Instrument]: LTQ Orbitrap XL mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher)

Comment[Separation]: nanoflow uHPLC (UltiMate 3000 RSLCnano System, ThermoFisher, Waltham, MA)
Comment[Instrument]: LTQ Orbitrap XL mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher)
